title: Karman Holdings CEO Sells Insider Shares For Four Consecutive Weeks
text: For four consecutive weeks, ending on Dec. 12, 2025, Karman Holdings' CEO sold insider shares. The chief executive sold over 200,000 shares within that span.

title: Karman Space & Defense Expands into High-Priority Maritime Defense Market with Agreement to Acquire Seemann Composites and Materials Sciences, Leaders in Advanced Composite Systems for Submarine, UUV/USV and Strategic Naval Surface Platforms
